abstract: Microsoft could jumpstart its online business through a purchase of Web giant Yahoo , but such a deal could also “open the door to potentially unmanageable risks,” analysts at UBS said in a report Thursday. The analysts are just the latest to consider whether Microsoft should buy Yahoo. Speculation about such a deal has only increased with Google‘s recent moves deeper into the software business.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft could jumpstart its online business through a purchase of Web giant Yahoo , but such a deal could also “open the door to potentially unmanageable risks,” analysts at UBS said in a report Thursday. The analysts are just the latest to consider whether Microsoft should buy Yahoo. Speculation about such a deal has only increased with Google‘s recent moves deeper into the software business.

headline.main: More Analysis of a Microsoft-Yahoo Deal
